faction.name: Army of the Ebon Forest
faction.description: The Army of the Ebon Forest (A.E.F.) constitutes the royal regular forces of the Ebon Forest, pledged to the service of their skeletal Wolf-King. While an under-equipped and unpopular institution, a combination of super-human resilience and clever tactics make the A.E.F. a remarkably stout defensive force and the most pressing threat to Intermarine liberty in the present day.

specialRules.name: Bloodlust
specialRules.description: A wolf in uniform is still a wolf. The smell of blood drives undisciplined troops into a killing frenzy. If this infantry unit reaches six pin tokens during the Fire Phase, the unit must roll a 4+ check to avoid going berserk.

specialRules.name: Guidance (X")
specialRules.description: The stories and sight of the Waykeepers steel the nerves of their flock against the killing temptation. This unit soothes friendly lupar within X inches from itself. Units which enter this radius automatically lose their berserk tokens, and units inside of the radius cannot gain them.

specialRules.name: Infiltrator
specialRules.description: Whether warden or poacher, the lupar are natural huntersâ€”the wilder, the better. This unit may deploy up to 16" away from your deployment edge, into occluding terrain, before any standard deployment by either side.

specialRules.name: Rally (Salt)
specialRules.description: Potent, artificial, unmistakable: the scent of signal salt drives lupar by drilled reflex to their objective. This Rally weapon only affects non-NBC lupar.

weapons.name: Stimulant-Laced Filter "Signal Snuff"
specialRules: This attack may only target self.

units.name: WAYKEEPER JUDGE
units.unitAbility: While this unit is alive, no unit in this army can willingly go Berserk. Only Judges may call Exhortation support Missions.

weapons.name: Stimulant-Laced Filter "Signal Snuff"
specialRules: This attack may only target self.

units.name: MADE-TO-ORDERS
units.unitAbility: If depleted, loses its depletion token at the end of round after winning a close combat.

units.name: VBD-U DENMOTHER
units.unitAbility: Units embarked may spot and be spotted by Sense.

units.name: VZ61 CHARIOTS
units.unitAbility: This unit may land in Forests and inside Buildings as a squad-sized garrison.

units.name: AES514 BACKBONE
units.unitAbility: Units embarked may spot and be spotted by Sense.
